static byte[] Use (Objects.Item item, Objects.Creature onCreature)
 Use an item on a creature (eg. use a rune on someone, drink a manafluid).
static byte[] UseOnBattlelist (Objects.Item item, Objects.Creature onCreature)
 Use an item on a creature in the battlelist. Is the same as shooting a rune on the battlelist.
static byte[] Move (Objects.Item fromItem, Objects.ItemLocation toLocation)
 Move an item to a location (eg. move a blank rune to the right hand).
static byte[] Move (Objects.Item fromItem, Objects.Item toItem)
 Move an item into another item (eg. put an item into a backpack).
static byte[] ItemLocationToBytes (Objects.ItemLocation location)
